attributes.action: Review the planned roll out for childcare support following chancellors budget
attributes.additional_details: Families not qualifing for help until Sept'24/25 will continue to endure financial struggles in a cost of living crisis. Working families face sizeable childcare fees to return to work, working more hours than they spend with their children to make it financially viable. For those struggling NOW the rollout is bound to have significant mental health impacts with lengthy waits to receive support. Support those supporting the system & their families by having REAL conversations with those affected
attributes.background: Review the rollout timeframe with practical suggestions of what childcare support working families can access in a cost of living crisis to level the playing field for all families. Have conversations affected families & listen to practical suggestions that could inform policy making decisions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Bring in March 2023 budget changes to childcare allowances immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634909

If you would like the Government to do something different to the above petition you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
